com.netflix.genie.agent.cli

Class CliAutoConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.agent.cli.CliAutoConfiguration

  • @Configuration
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value=AgentProperties.class)
public class CliAutoConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Spring auto configuration class to contain all beans involved in the CLI for the Agent.
    Since:
    4.0.0

      • agentLogManagerLog4j2

        @Bean
 @ConditionalOnClass(name="org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LoggerContext")
 @ConditionalOnMissingBean(value=AgentLogManager.class)
public AgentLogManagerLog4j2Impl agentLogManagerLog4j2()
        Provide an AgentLogManager implementation that can relocate the agent log file created by log4j2.
        Returns:
        the log4j2 implementation of AgentLogManager
